snippet: WEISSBERG--Ruth F.,on March 16, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Herbert, Devoted mother of Steven and the late David. Adored grandmother of Logan and Alana. Service Friday, March 18, 12 noon at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in her memory to Hadassah or The Brotherhood Synagogue would be appreciated. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEISSBERG--Ruth F.,on March 16, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Herbert, Devoted mother of Steven and the late David. Adored grandmother of Logan and Alana. Service Friday, March 18, 12 noon at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in her memory to Hadassah or The Brotherhood Synagogue would be appreciated. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEISSBERG, RUTH F.
